type.desc: Set the coordinate system type to polar coordinate system

start.desc: Coordinate system start point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

end.desc: Coordinate system end point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

origin.desc: Coordinate system origin coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

translate.desc: Additional translation transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

rotate.desc: Additional rotation transformation applied to the coordinate system

scale.desc: Additional scaling transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

transpose.desc: Additional transpose transformation applied to the coordinate system
